title: Figure skater Nathan Chen looks ahead to Beijing 2022
description: Figure skating superstar Nathan Chen of the USA has won the world title three times, picked up a team Olympic bronze medal, and took home the Grand Prix Final title three times. He somehow manages to find time to train on the ice, skateboard and play a little bit of guitar. For the moment, he is truly focused on Beijing 2022 and the start of the Olympic season. Nathan joined Nick McCarvel to play a few tunes on his guitar and have a chat.
